summary: Client requested Sarah to start a vision meeting; the PM asked what to call the project. Other roles did not provide input.

actions.task: Schedule and start the vision meeting as requested by the client

backlog_deltas.title: Add vision meeting to the meeting schedule/agenda

risks.risk: Project name undecided, causing potential ambiguity in communication and planning
risks.mitigation: PM to propose project name options before or during the vision meeting and include naming as a confirmed agenda item to reach a decision
